item.title: Who Is a Full Stack Developer
item.description: TLDR: Anyone who is able to take a project from start to finish while keeping an eye on presentation, efficiency, scalability, and security (not particularly in that order) is considered a Fullstack Developer. If you’re new to this field or have been writing Assembly since the dawn of transistors, you might have heard the term “Fullstack Developer”. And if you ask around, you’ll most likely get as many definitions as there are mouths to talk about this.
